patterns: How many credit hours do I need to complete?
number of credit hours to be completed for masters degree
responses: For Masters degree in Data Sceince at UNT total number of required credit hours are 36

patterns: In details about the courses required to complete
Degree Structure for masters in Data Sceince degree
responses: 3 Required courses, 9 Guided electives, 15 General electives, 9 Internship/research project, 3 visit(https://informationscience.unt.edu/ms-data-science-degree-structure) for detailed information about the courses.

patterns: Do I need to contact anyone before registering to courses?
What is the Course Registration process for more info visit
responses: All students should contact their advisor for assistance before registering for classes. sessions are available for both current and prospective students, however, sessions must be scheduled in advance.
contact information Sceince Advising department, for more info visit ( https://informationscience.unt.edu/academic-advising)
